register.response: 📝 To join Wasla Hackathon: visit waslahackathon.com → Click 'Register Now'. For help, contact support@waslahackathon.com

prizes.response: 🏆 Wasla Hackathon prizes info: visit waslahackathon.com or contact info@waslahackathon.com

schedule.response: 📅 Check the event schedule at waslahackathon.com or contact info@waslahackathon.com

teams.response: 🤝 Teams: register individually or as a team (3-5 members). Join team formation sessions via our Discord/Slack channels.

technical.response: 🛠️ For technical issues, please contact support@waslahackathon.com or check our FAQ section online.

payment.response: 💰 Registration is free. If you face any payment issues, contact support@waslahackathon.com

early_registration.response: ⏰ Early registration ends on the date mentioned on waslahackathon.com. Make sure to register before the deadline!

resources.response: 📚 You can access Hackathon guides, tutorials, and documentation at waslahackathon.com/resources

default.response: 👋 Hello! I can help with Registration, Prizes, Schedule, Teams, Technical info, Payment, Resources, or Contact. For other questions, try contacting support@waslahackathon.com
